START_SCAN.description: Button title to initiate the scan process

SCAN_PAGE_DESCRIPTION.message:
Scan your Facebook friends' birthdays.

Already scanned birthdays will be preserved, even if your friends decide to hide them or are no longer linked on Facebook.

You can always repeat the scan to add new friends' birthdays to the previously created list.

SCAN_PAGE_FIRST_TIME_DESCRIPTION.message:
Welcome to Birthday Calendar Creator for Facebook!

To generate and download a calendar, an initial birthday scan is required. After a successful scan, the link to the "Calendar Generator" will become available.

You can always repeat the scan to add new friends' birthdays to the previously created list.

Already scanned birthdays will be preserved, even if your friends decide to hide them or are no longer linked on Facebook.
